department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK , Tendering Procedures: Suppliers on permanent list or able to meet qualification requirements , Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid , Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No , Nature of Requirements: Searches and Rescue Training , Note: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W0125-22WR17/A dated 2022-07-06 with a closing of 2022-08-08 at 2:00 PM EDT.
duration_in_months: For the period of date of Award to 2024-03-31, with an irrevocable option to extend the term of the Contract by one (1) 1-year period.
